welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Port-Alfred, a charming coastal city known for its picturesque views and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bagotville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bagotville Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Refuge Cove SPB Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Floatplane Terminal
terminals.description: The floatplane terminal at Refuge Cove SPB Airport is used for smaller planes and offers scenic flights over the surrounding islands.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity due to the remote location.
